value.title: Extract function in Power Query removes all the text? Here is how to fix it.
value.excerpt: Sometimes when you extract text in Power Query, instead of removing the text you specified, it removes the entire text. value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.

value.title: How to create hierarchies in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you want to create hierarchies in Power BI, you need to structure your data in a special way, so they get displayed as hierarchies in Power BI.  In todays video I will show you how to model your data in Power Query, so your hierarchies are displayed correcly.  Link to Advance fill down techniques:

value.title: Power BI Quick Tip: the Formula Bar in Power Query
value.excerpt: Often you do the transformation in Power Query using the graphical interface, but having the formula bar visible, makes it much easier to understand or change the transformations. In this short blog and video, I'll explain that. read my blog with more details here: https://radacad.com/power-bi-quick-tip-the-formula-bar-in-power-query

value.title: Remove Duplicate Does not Work in Power Query for Power BI Here is the Solution
value.excerpt: One of the most common transformations in Power Query is the Remove Duplicates. This transformation is used in many scenarios, one of the examples, is to create a dimension table with unique IDs in it, so can be used as the source of a one to many relationships to fact tables in the relationship diagram
